{"id":885777575,"question_id":15,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 1 month","timestamp":1674752219,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/885777575/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"3Sum","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    vector<vector<int>> threeSum(vector<int>& nums) {\n        vector<vector<int>> ans;\n        sort(nums.begin(), nums.end());\n        int lo = -1e6, ro = -1e6;\n        for(int i = 0; i < nums.size() - 2; i++){\n            if(i > 0 && nums[i - 1] == nums[i]) continue;\n            int l = i + 1, r = nums.size() - 1;\n            while(l < r){\n                if(nums[i] + nums[l] + nums[r] < 0 || lo == nums[l]) l++;\n                else if(nums[i] + nums[l] + nums[r] > 0 || ro == nums[r]) r--;\n                else{\n                    lo = nums[l], ro = nums[r];\n                    ans.push_back({nums[i], nums[l], nums[r]});\n                    l++, r--;\n                }\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"3sum","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
